articles.author: Katherine Donlevy
articles.title: 3 bodies found in search of US, Australian surfers who vanished in Mexico: report - New York Post
articles.description: Three bodies were found near a popular Mexican surfing destination where an American and two Australian tourists vanished last week, according to a report.
articles.content:
Three bodies were found near a popular Mexican surfing destination where an American and two Australian tourists vanished last week, according to a report.
